name: ray-input
description: Cross platform VR input capabilities. For desktop, mobile, Cardboard, Daydream and Vive.

scripts.build: browserify --standalone RayInput -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/ray-input.js -o build/ray.js  && browserify --standalone Example -vdt [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/example/main.js -o build/example.js
